title: Zagevestigator

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If it is Night 1, your ability will fail.
- Your ability processes last.
- If your target is still alive, you send them into non-existence and kill them. Any abilities they used past Night 1 will be thanos snapped out of existence.
- If your target is already dead, you get to choose someone else until you find another living person.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who survives past Night 1. (yes this can be interpreted as people dying n1 and being revived being able to win with this that sounds hilarious lmao)

desc:
